explains: n. 衣服，（尤指某种）服装
v. 给……穿衣，为……提供衣服，赋予（某人某品质）（clothe 的现在分词）
wordGroup: clothing industry 服装工业；制衣业；缝纫业
protective clothing 防护衣；防护罩，安全罩
clothing store 服装店；成衣店
clothing factory 服装厂；被服厂
special clothing 专用工作服；特殊服；非凡服

sentences.en: His clothing was stained with mud.
Do you get an allowance for clothing?
She was deliberately mismatching articles of clothing.
